title: Henry V: the Battle of Agincourt [study extract]
brief_description: Vividly presents the Battle of Agincourt, from Henry V by Shakespeare. The study extract shows the preparations for, and the actual fighting by, both infantry and cavalry with all its noise, colour and confusion.
